TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UrlBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 启动使用户可以选择或创建 URL 的 URL 编辑器。

span.span: Starts a URL editor that allows a user to select or create a URL.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法启动用于选择 URL 的用户界面。The method starts a user interface for selecting a URL. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在设计时使用方法从菜单命令启动 URL 生成器。The following code example shows how to use the method to launch a URL builder from a menu command at design time. [!code-cpp[UrlBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UrlBuilderExample/CPP/urlbuilderdesigner.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[UrlBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UrlBuilderExample/CS/urlbuilderdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UrlBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UrlBuilderExample/VB/urlbuilderdesigner.vb#1)]

summary.span: 创建用户界面以创建或选取 URL。

span.span: Creates a UI to create or pick a URL.

[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

param.name: component
param.span: 将使用其站点来访问设计时服务的 。

span.span: The whose site is to be used to access design-time services.

param.name: owner
param.span: 用作选择器窗口的父级的 。

span.span: The used as the parent for the picker window.

param.name: initialUrl
param.span: 要在选择器窗口中显示的初始 URL。

span.span: The initial URL to be shown in the picker window.
The caption of the picker window.

param.name: filter
param.span: 筛选字符串，用于有选择地筛选显示在选择器窗口中的文件。

span.span: The filter string to use to optionally filter the files displayed in the picker window.

summary.span: 创建用户界面以创建或选取 URL。

span.span: Creates a UI to create or pick a URL.

returns.span: 从用户界面中返回的 URL。

span.span: The URL returned from the UI.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在设计时使用方法从菜单命令启动 URL 生成器。The following code example shows how to use the method to launch a URL builder from a menu command at design time. remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口用于获取 设计器宿主的实现。The interface is used to obtain the implementation for the designer host.
